[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: get_proof_from_jwt()] [Configuration mismatch] Does the default Configuration::new_for_devnet() match the on-chain keyless configuration, or can mismatches cause verification failures? (High)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: get_proof_from_jwt()] [Expiration manipulation] Can an attacker set exp_horizon_secs differently from the configuration to bypass proof expiration checks? (High)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: get_pepper_from_jwt()] [Pepper caching] If the pepper service is unavailable, can stale cached peppers be reused in a way that compromises security? (High)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: generate_for_testing()] [Blinder weakness] The blinder uses vec![0x01; 31] - is this predictable pattern secure for testing, or can it leak into production? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: generate_for_testing()] [Expiration time] The 7-day expiration may be too long for ephemeral keys - can this be exploited if test accounts are used in production? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: received_event_key()] [Key collision] Can the hardcoded EventKey numbers (2 and 3) collide with event keys from other modules or accounts? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: sent_event_key()] [Event spoofing] Can attackers generate events with matching keys to impersonate legitimate transfer events? (High)

[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: authentication_key()] [Key consistency] For Keyless accounts, does the authentication key remain constant across JWT renewals, or can key changes break account access? (High)
[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: authentication_key()] [Todo panic] The Abstraction variants use todo!() - can legitimate API usage trigger these panics? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/sdk/src/types.rs] [Function: auth()] [Sign function leakage] Does returning Auth::Abstraction with Arc<dyn Fn> leak sensitive function pointers that could be exploited? (Medium)
